headline.main: Titans of Oil World Meet in Houston After Two-Year Price War
headline.print_headline: Titans of Oil World Meet in Houston After Two-Year Price War

lead_paragraph: The biggest names in the oil world come together this week for the largest industry gathering since the end of a two-year price war that pitted Middle East exporters against the firms that drove the shale energy revolution in the United States.
snippet: The biggest names in the oil world come together this week for the largest industry gathering since the end of a two-year price war that pitted Middle East exporters against the firms that drove the shale energy revolution in the United States....
